description: This source file defines a React functional component 'NoteViewPage' which displays a note's title, content, and metadata with options to edit or navigate back. It uses React hooks and React Router for routing and data access.

methods.name: NoteViewPage()
methods.description: React functional component that displays the details of a note, including title, ID, content, and an edit link. It handles the case if the note isn't found by rendering a message with navigation options.
